docs.text:
Head First Design Patterns 7 - Adapter and Facade Pattern


Adapter Pattern defined




The Adapter Pattern converts the interface of a class into another interface the clients expect. Adapter lets classes work together that couldn’t otherwise because of incompatible interfaces.




Facade Pattern defined




The Facade Pattern provides a uniﬁed interface to a set of interfaces in a subsystem. Facade defines a higher-level interface that makes the subsystem easier to use.




The Principle of Least Knowledge




Principle of Least Knowledge talk only to your immediate friends.
